titles.title: 038 To God be the Glory = hymn

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
To God be the glory,
great things He hath done.
So loved He the world
that He gave us His Son,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who yielded His life
an atonement for sin
And opened the lifegate
that all may go in.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice.
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
O, come to the Father
through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory,
great things He hath done.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O, perfect redemption
the purchase of blood,
To every believer
the promise of God.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
The vilest offender,
who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus
a pardon receives.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Great things He hath taught us,
Great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing
through Jesus the Son,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
But purer and higher
and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport
when Jesus we see.
